LanguageData.DebugWriterConfirmation: Are you sure you want to enable the DebugWriter? This will significantly decrease performance in return for Achievement related data. This should only be enabled to track valuable information for debugging.
LanguageData.GenerateLogInfoTooltip: Push achievement related logs to file. For debugging purposes only.
LanguageData.SuccessfulWriteToFile: Successfully pushed achievement logs to AchievementLog.txt
LanguageData.SideBarInfo: Unlock achievements and earn Storyteller points which you can redeem for various events.
LanguageData.VAE_SideBarInfoNoRedeem: Unlock achievements and earn Storyteller points to gauge your performance.
LanguageData.FailedTargetFinder: Must have map loaded or IncidentTarget object selected on World Map
LanguageData.NoValidMap: Must be purchased with PlayerHome map in view.
LanguageData.VAE_UsePointsSystemDesc: By default, getting achievements rewards the player with points, which can be exchanged for trader caravans, events, raids, etc. Toggling this disables that system, with the points being there just as a tally count.
LanguageData.VAE_CollateModTabsDesc: By checking this option all achievements from all mods will be joined into a single Mod tab. Use this if you have many achievement adding mods and your achievement window looks like a mess of infinite diminutive tabs
